GateDocument.TextWithNodes: 9 – 13 March 2008 Town and Country Resort & Convention Center San Diego, California, USA SPIE Smart Structures provides cutting-edge information on: Imaging, Sensors, and Displays Adaptive Structures & Mechanisms Smart Structures & Vehicles Actuators and Damping Biomimetics and Robotic Systems Multifunctional Materials Embedded and Self Diagnosis Sensors Modeling and Control Sensor Networks Real-Time NDE Structural Health Monitoring
